front.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV
front.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, constructional requirements, and application considerations for overhead and padmounted, dry-vault, and submersible automatic line sectionalizers for ac systems are specified.
